org.seedstack.seed.core.utils

Class SeedReflectionUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.seedstack.seed.core.utils.SeedReflectionUtils

  • @Hack(value="Works nice, but not fully reusable.")
public final class SeedReflectionUtils
extends Object
    Class with various utility methods for reflection.
    Author:
    epo.jemba@ext.mpsa.com, adrien.lauer@mpsa.com, pierre.thirouin@ext.mpsa.com

    • Method Detail

      • getMetaAnnotationFromAncestors

        @Magic(type=WHITE)
public static <T extends Annotation> T getMetaAnnotationFromAncestors(AnnotatedElement annotatedElement,
                                                                                         Class<T> annotationClassToFind)
        This methods take as parameter an annotatedElement (Class, Field, Method, Constructor ) and an annotation class. It returns an annotation instance that meet the requirement : instance of the class annotationClassToFind.

        If annotatedElement is a class the method will reach all super type and for each of those type, it will reach all implemented interfaces and for each implemented interfaces it will reach all super interfaces

        If annotatedElement is not a class the method will look for the annotation class only in this element, other all the hierarchy.

        From this list, the method will reach for the annotation class in all annotation hierarchy.

        Type Parameters:
        T - the annotation type to retrieve
        Parameters:
        annotatedElement - The annotated element from where to start.
        annotationClassToFind - The annotation class to find.
        Returns:
        ? extends Annotation

      • getMethodOrAncestorMetaAnnotatedWith

        @Magic(type=WHITE)
public static <T extends Annotation> T getMethodOrAncestorMetaAnnotatedWith(AnnotatedElement annotatedElement,
                                                                                               Class<T> annotationClassToFind)
        This methods take as parameter an annotatedElement (Class, Field, Method, Constructor ) and an annotation class. It returns an annotation instance that meet the requirement : instance of the class annotationClassToFind.

        If annotatedElement is a class the method will reach all super type and for each of those type, it will reach all implemented interfaces and for each implemented interfaces it will reach all super interfaces

        If annotatedElement is not a class the method will look for the annotation class in this element, and in the declaring class and all its ancestors.

        From this list, the method will reach for the annotation class in all annotation hierarchy.

        Type Parameters:
        T - the annotation type to retrieve
        Parameters:
        annotatedElement - The annotated element from where to start.
        annotationClassToFind - The annotation class to find.
        Returns:
        ? extends Annotation

      • getAnnotationDeep

        public static Annotation getAnnotationDeep(Annotation from,
                                           Class<? extends Annotation> toFind)
        This method is looking for the annotation class toFind from the annoFrom annotation instance. It will reach recursively until the annotation is found.
        Parameters:
        from - the annotation to search from.
        toFind - the annotation to find.
        Returns:
        the found annotation or null if nothing found.

      • hasAnnotationDeep

        public static boolean hasAnnotationDeep(Class<?> clazz,
                                        Class<? extends Annotation> annotationClass)
        Check if the class clazz has the annotation annotationClass up in the hierarchy.
        Parameters:
        clazz - The class to search from.
        annotationClass - The annotation class to search.
        Returns:
        true if annotation is present, false otherwise.

      • getAllInterfacesAndClasses

        public static Class<?>[] getAllInterfacesAndClasses(Class<?> clazz)
        Returns all the interfaces and classes implemented or extended by a class.
        Parameters:
        clazz - The class to search from.
        Returns:
        The array of classes and interfaces found.

      • getAllInterfacesAndClasses

        public static Class<?>[] getAllInterfacesAndClasses(Class<?>[] classes)
        This method walks up the inheritance hierarchy to make sure we get every class/interface extended or implemented by classes.
        Parameters:
        classes - The classes array used as search starting point.
        Returns:
        the found classes and interfaces.

      • isProxy

        public static boolean isProxy(Class<?> proxyClass)
        Tests if the class is a proxy.
        Parameters:
        proxyClass - The class to test.
        Returns:
        true if class is proxy false otherwise.

      • cleanProxy

        public static Class<?> cleanProxy(Class<?> toClean)
        Return the non proxy class if needed.
        Parameters:
        toClean - The class to clean.
        Returns:
        the cleaned class.

      • findMostCompleteClassLoader

        public static ClassLoader findMostCompleteClassLoader(Class<?> target)
        Find the most complete class loader by trying the current thread context class loader, then the classloader of the given class if any, then the class loader that loaded SEED core, then the system class loader.
        Parameters:
        target - the class to get the class loader from if no current thread context class loader is present. May be null.
        Returns:
        the most complete class loader it found.

      • findMostCompleteClassLoader

        public static ClassLoader findMostCompleteClassLoader()
        Find the most complete class loader by trying the current thread context class loader, then the class loader that loaded SEED core, then the system class loader.
        Returns:
        the most complete class loader it found.

      • isClassPresent

        public static boolean isClassPresent(String name)
        Returns if a class is present in the classpath without initializing it.
        Parameters:
        name - the class name to check.
        Returns:
        true if the class is present in the classpath, false otherwise.

      • methodsFromAncestors

        public static Set<Method> methodsFromAncestors(Method method)
        Given the class targetClass (not an interface) the method will return all matched methods for method. Methods will be reached in extended super classes or implemented interfaces.
        Parameters:
        method - from which the search starts.
        Returns:
        a set of methods grabbed from parent classes and interfaces.

      • parameterAnnotationsFromAncestors

        public static Annotation[] parameterAnnotationsFromAncestors(Method method,
                                                             Class<? extends Annotation> annotationClass)
        This method iterates on method parameter and go through all method hierarchy to find the given annotation. If the annotation if found on a parameter in the method hierarchy, the annotation is returned in the array at the parameter index.
        Parameters:
        method - the method to check
        annotationClass - the annotation to found
        Returns:
        array of annotation found

      • allParametersAnnotationsFromAncestors

        public static Set<Annotation[][]> allParametersAnnotationsFromAncestors(Method method)
        Finds all parameter annotations of a method including its ancestors.
        Parameters:
        method - from which the search starts.
        Returns:
        a set of methods grabed from parent classes and interfaces.

      • isPresent

        public static boolean isPresent(Set<Method> methods,
                                Class<? extends Annotation> annotationClass)
        Checks if an annotation is present on a set of methods (itself or on at lest one of its parameters) set.
        Parameters:
        methods - the methods where the annotation is searched.
        annotationClass - the annotation to check for.
        Returns:
        true if the annotation is present, false otherwise.

      • methodsAreEquivalent

        public static boolean methodsAreEquivalent(Method left,
                                           Method right)
        Checks if two methods are equivalent (same name, same parameter types, same return types).
        Parameters:
        left - the first method to check.
        right - the second method to check.
        Returns:
        true if methods are equivalent, false otherwise.

      • findCaller

        public static StackTraceElement findCaller(Object self)
        Find the caller of a method.
        Parameters:
        self - the instance within the check is made.
        Returns:
        the found StackTraceElement or null if not found.

      • getAnnotationMetaAnnotatedFromAncestor

        public static <T extends Annotation> Annotation getAnnotationMetaAnnotatedFromAncestor(Class<?> annotatedElementClass,
                                                                                       Class<T> metaAnnotationToFind)
        Finds a annotation meta-annotated on the given annotated element.

        If the annotated element is a class, the method will go through all its parent class and interface to find an annotation meta annotated.

        Type Parameters:
        T - the annotation type to retrieve
        Parameters:
        annotatedElementClass - the annotated element to reach
        metaAnnotationToFind - the meta annotation to find
        Returns:
        the annotation meta annotated if exist, null otherwise

      • getAnnotationMetaAnnotated

        public static <T extends Annotation> Annotation getAnnotationMetaAnnotated(AnnotatedElement annotatedElementClass,
                                                                           Class<T> metaAnnotationToFind)
        Finds a annotation meta-annotated on the given annotated element.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the annotation type to retrieve
        Parameters:
        annotatedElementClass - the annotated element
        metaAnnotationToFind - the meta annotation to find
        Returns:
        the annotation meta annotated if exist, null otherwise

      • invokeMethod

        public static Object invokeMethod(Object target,
                                  String method,
                                  Object... args)
        Invoke a named method through reflection on the target object.
        Parameters:
        target - the object to invoke the method on.
        method - the name of the method.
        args - the arguments array to pass to the method.
        Returns:
        the return value of the invoked method.

        public static Object getFieldValue(Object target,
                                   String fieldName)
        Retrieve a field value through reflection on the target object.
        Parameters:
        target - the object to get the field value from.
        fieldName - the field name.
        Returns:
        the field value.

                                 String fieldName,
                                 Object value)
        Set a field value through reflection on the target object.
